name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As we approach the 35th anniversary of June 4th, human rights in China @hrichina
, Humane China @HChina89 cooperated to release a series of June 4th thematic photos from the scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement (May 31)
[The government buys the support of suburban farmers] [Deng Xiaoping approves new martial law plan]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/ZgvgDVzA2H

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 31, Baoding, Hebei. Due to a series of suicides at the Wanbo Shopping Center, the mall has set up a protective net and hired security guards to prevent suicides.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 30, a Xiaohongshu netizen discovered that domestic journals have stopped accepting papers related to the new coronavirus at least half a year ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 1, a street stabbing incident occurred in Quyang County, Hebei Province, where a man brandished a dagger and a sickle and chased and slashed several people. It was reported that the incident had caused the death of three people and the suspect had been arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 1, kindergartens across the country began to feature “anti-Japanese” programs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 1, the famous anti-counterfeiting internet celebrity "Tietou" released a video of himself going to the Yasukuni Shrine, peeing on the stone pillars and writing the English word "toilet" with red paint.
It is reported that this move is to fulfill his previous promise of "going to Japan to fight them before December 31, 2024, and fighting them in two places."
Tietou once attracted the attention of netizens for shooting anti-counterfeiting videos, but in February this year, he was banned from all domestic platforms for exposing his experience of soliciting prostitution during a live broadcast.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on May 30, The Paper sorted through documents such as the "Statistical Bulletin on Education Development" from various places and found that 80% of cities will see a wave of kindergarten closures in 2023, and the number of kindergarten employees may decrease by 10 million in the next two years. The number of kindergartens in first-tier and new first-tier provincial capital cities will increase instead of decrease.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen from Guizhou posted that a Moutai subsidiary was recruiting warehouse keeper positions with an annual salary of 30,000 to 40,000 before tax. The application-to-recruitment ratio was greater than 1,200:1.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 1, a university in Shanxi issued a notice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. State Department said on Friday that the United States will impose new visa restrictions on Chinese and Hong Kong officials over the convictions of Hong Kong pro-democracy organizers in national security trials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the TV series "The Last Chef" was officially announced to be broadcast, but the actress Stephy Tang in it caused controversy. The reason is that in 2019, Hong Kong artist Stephy Tang posted a photo of opening champagne to celebrate the completion of filming on Instagram, and used the word "kill the scene" in the caption, which was questioned by netizens as deliberately insulting the police (the Cantonese word "kill the scene" is a homophone of "kill the police"). Although Stephy Tang posted a statement on May 29 that she "wholeheartedly supports and insists that the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is an inalienable part of the People's Republic of China",

content: Under the relevant video, Tietou's behavior received widespread support

content:
On June 1, at the intersection of Anyang Wenming Avenue and Zhongzhou Road, at the entrance of Yucuiyuan Community, a man stabbed a woman with a dagger and fled on a bicycle.
The recorder on the delivery man recorded everything.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 31, Beijing, a petitioner loudly accused the police of leaking his personal information at the Petition Bureau, and a staff member nearby immediately turned on the loudspeaker to interrupt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 31, Tangshan, Hebei. Villagers of Niangniangmiao Village defend their rights
Villagers reported that the village has been demolished for more than ten years, but the government has not yet solved the problem of residents' resettlement, and the transition fee has not been paid on time, resulting in the villagers being homeless and forced to hold up their ID cards to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 1, Wuxi, Jiangsu. Shenyang Tengyue Construction Company owed workers wages, and the workers went on strike and blocked the door to demand wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 1 (Released) In Hefei, Anhui, it was reported online that a local transport management staff member was knocked to the ground by an online ride-hailing vehicle while checking a vehicle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 31, the new equipment of Jiyuan Public Security Bureau was unveiled. The special police tried on the new "explosion-proof assault suit" for the first time and said that wearing this new "armor" made them "feel confident and safe" when facing emergencies. 
This statement was ridiculed by a large number of netizens.
